lines.Line: (entering) Hey! I'm all packed and ready to go
Oh, that's right! (to Emma) Daddy and uncle Joey are going on a trip today. We're going to a conference in Barbados, right

Ok, I gotta say. I mean, it means so much to me that you guys are coming all the way over there to hear me do my speech! UH! And I've a surprise, uh... I had to pull some strings but I was able to get everyone passes to the entire conference! That's right! (he gives them their passes) This babies will get you into all the paleontology lectures and seminars
Do you have anything that would... get us out of them
Yeah Ross, I mean... we're excited to hear the speech but the rest of the time we're gonna wanna do, you know, "island's stuff"
I think David would probably wanna hear a few lectures
I think David would probably wanna hear a few lectures
Oh, right, because he's a scientist
No, no, because, you know, he's been in Minsk for 8 years and if he gets too much direct sunlight, he'll die
Ok, we gotta go, yeah? So, we'll see you guys tomorrow
Ok, we gotta go, yeah? So, we'll see you guys tomorrow
All right, let's do it! 5 hour flight with Charlie, have a couple of drinks, get under that blanket and do what comes naturally
It's a blanket Joe, not a cloak of invisibility
David, can you help me?! I'm trying to explain to Chandler how a plane stays in the air
Oh, certainly. That's a combination of Bernoulli's principle and Newton's third law of motion
Yeah, that's the same as "it has something to do with wind"
Alright, I'm gonna go pick up a few things for the trip
Oh, I should go, too. Oh, now... tomorrow do you guys wanna share a cab to the airport or should Mike and I just meet you there
Mike is your ex... uh... boyfriend
That's right! Oh, yeah... Well, I've totally forgotten about im! AH! That's-That's... a blast from the past
Really, it doesn't mean anything. I mean, you know, Monica refers to Chandler as Richard all the time
(pinching her) Let's get you out of here!! (they go outside
At least you took me down with you
I'm sooo sorry!! I just... I keep thinking about Mike! I'm crazy about David, and we're having so much fun together. Why-Why do I miss Mike? That's-that's gonna go away, right
I mean, my feelings for Richard are certainly gone
You just did it again. Chandler, your feelings for Chandler are certainly gone

3.SceneDescription: Joey in his hotel in room in Barbados

lines.Character: (Trying on a hat and talking to his own reflection in the mirro
lines.Line: Trying on a hat and talking to his own reflection in the mirror
Yeah! How you doin'? Yeah alright
Hey, hey! You said you're gonna wear a thong, where's the thong
(laughing) I didn't mean a thong... I meant thongs..
You really should have been more clear about that
You really should have been more clear about that

lines.Character: (Someone knocks the door, Joey goes to open it and Ross is on the other sid
lines.Line: Someone knocks the door, Joey goes to open it and Ross is on the other side
(Excited) You're never going to guess who I just saw downstairs
Yeah, she never misses these conferences! (then to Charlie) No, I just saw Dr. Kenneth Schwartz
Oh my God! Did you talk to him
Oh my God! Did you talk to him
Yeah... what am I going to say to Kenneth Schwartz
You could say: "Hey Kenny, how come you're not Britney Spears?" (looks at Ross matter-of-factly
Wha...? You're gonna go now? I thought we could hang out
Oh I can't... I have seminars all day and I promised Ross I would look at his speech
But maybe we can have dinner later? On the balcony? Will be romantic
Oh... you got yourself a very weird deal
(a little embarassed by their conversation) I'm good, I have dinner plans (moves away from them)
Yeah, yeah. I've got tons of stuff I could do. I'm gonna hit the beach, go swimming..
Uh, Joe, have you looked outside

lines.Character: (Ross goes to the window and opens the curtains revealing that it's raining outsid
lines.Line: Ross goes to the window and opens the curtains revealing that it's raining outside
There's an indoor pool, you can swim there! (Ross agrees
I wasn't gonna swim, I was gonna dig a hole! (removes a small plastic spade used by children to play on the beach from his backpack

4.SceneDescription: Barbados, hotel lounge. David, Phoebe and Rachel have just arrived.

lines.Character: (Joey spots them and walks towards the
lines.Line: Joey spots them and walks towards them
Oh! Hey! Thank God you guys are here
Everything is upside down here! It rains all day long, nobody watches tv and Ross is famous

lines.Character: (Rachel turns around and sees Chandler and Monica arrivin
lines.Line: Rachel turns around and sees Chandler and Monica arriving
Alright, I don't wanna alarm anybody, but Monica's hair is twice as big as it was when we landed
Monica and Chandler reach the group
Monica and Chandler reach the group
Ok! When I go places with high humidity, it gets a little extra body, ok?
That's why our honeymoon photos look like me and Diana Ross
That's why our honeymoon photos look like me and Diana Ross
Come on, I'll show you guys where to check in (Joey, Chandler and David leave
(to Chandler) Oh, honey, can you make sure we get a King size bed
(shouts after David) Oh! David, get one for us too! Oh, oh, and see if they have a heart-shaped one! And with mirrors on the ceiling
(shouts to Chandler) And make sure our room isn't next to theirs (points to Phoebe)
Ooh! You guys are so lucky you are here with people, you known it's such a romantic place. That's all, I just wish I could (looks at Joey who is at the check in desk) share that with a guy
Not Joey, no, I was just lusting after Chandler
So, ehm... I'm proposing to Pheobe tonight. (Removes a ring box from his pocket and opens it to show Chandler the ring
Tonight?! (looks at the ring) Isn't an engagement ring supposed to have a diamond? (squints at the ring to emphasize how tiny the diamond is) Oh, there it is
Yeah, well, being a failed scientist doesn't pay quite as well as you might think. That's uhm... one seventieth of a karat. And the clarity is uhm... is quite poor
(slaps him on the shoulder) Nice! (goes to Monica
(slaps him on the shoulder) Nice! (goes to Monica
(slaps him on the shoulder) Nice! (goes to Monica
Monica, can I talk to you for a sec? (Pulls her away from Phoebe and Rachel
David is going to propose to Phoebe tonight
See what happens when you give people advice? I hope you told him not to
Ok fine. I'll handle this. (goes to Phoebe who's talking to Rachel) Phoebe
(looking very serious) I need to talk to you
Are you leaving "The Supremes"? (Monica and Phoebe go to one side
Ok, my husband just gave your boyfriend some very bad advice. Look, David is going to propose to you tonight
What are you serious? You wanna marry him? Wha... What about Mike

Oh, ok, you want me to marry Mike? Alright, well, let's just gag him and handcuff him and force him down the aisle. I can just see it: "Mike, do you take Phoebe..." (gestures with her hand as if someone is covering her mouth and tries to shout "No! No!") You know, it's every girl's dream
Do you really think marrying someone else is the right answer
Do you really think marrying someone else is the right answer
Sure! Look, ok, bottom line: I love Mike... David! David. I love David. Don't look at me that way, Roseanne Rosannadanna

5.SceneDescription: Mike's apartment. His phone rings and he picks up

lines.Line: Ok, Mike, enough is enough, now you love Phoebe and she loves you, so you need to get over your whole "I never want to get married" thing and step up
This is Monica! I'm Phoebe's friend. Listen, Phoebe is back with David and he's going to propose to her, and she is going to say "yes" but I know she really wants to be with you
(sounds shocked and sits down) He... he's gonna propose
I... I'm sorry, did you say something? I can't hear through all this damned hair! (Tries to move her huge hair away from the phone, in vain
Look, if Phoebe wants to marry David, she should, I'm not gonna stand in the way of that and neither should you

You don't tell me what to do! I tell you what to do! Just call her. She's at the Paradise Hotel in Barbados. And while I've got you, you've got curly hair. What do you do in humidity? (Mike hangs up the phone) Damnit
(pretending not to sense the tone) Oooh! I hope you're happy too, honey
Phoebe is going to say "Yes" to David. See, that's what happens when you meddle in people's lives
Phoebe is going to say "yes"? That's, that's great
Phoebe is going to say "yes"? That's, that's great
No it's not, b'cause she's still in love with Mike
And there's not chance that will work
No, I called him. It's not gonna happen
No, I called him. It's not gonna happen

Well, if you hadn't meddled to start with, I wouldn't have had to go in there and meddle myself. Now, no matter how much we meddle, we will never be able to un-meddle the thing that you meddled up - in the first place

6.SceneDescription: Ross's room. Charlie is sitting on the bed, while Ross is walking up and down nervously

lines.Line: And then, and then you said that thing about, about bringing the Mesozoic era in the 21st century
Oh my God, we did it! (he sits beside her and skims through her notes excitedly
Actually I did it Ross. You remembered shockingly little of your own speech
Yes, but I did make a pyramid out of the bath products. This is amazing, thank you, thank you so much. (he leans in, and they look at each other for a moment) That's a pretty necklace
Hey, what do you say we celebrate? Champagne? (he goes to get the champagne
Oh yeah! Hey, save the cork and then we can fill the bottle with water and put it back so they don't charge you
Oh my God, I love you
Oh my God, I love you
Oh my God, I love you
Oh, this is such a cute picture of Emma. And is this your son... or just some kid whose picture you bring on vacation
That's Ben, my son from my first marriage
So, why did you break up
So, why did you break up
(embarassed) Oh, it was... it's complicated, you know? She... she was... eh... gay
Oh my God, this is so cool
Oh my God, this is so cool
Ok, odd thing to get excited about
No, it's just... I was enganged to a guy who turned out to be gay
Didn't you feel so stupid that you didn't see the signs? My fiancé was always going away on these long weekends with his tennis partner
My wife had a workout friend she went to the gym with everyday for a year. She didn't get any fitter
Right and then everybody finds out and they're like: "Oh, I knew all along
I know! It's like, if you knew, why didn't you tell me, you know? I mean, call, or leave a note: "Hi, I just dropped by to say your wife's gay
And then, you try to make the best of a bad situation, so you float the idea of a threesome

7.SceneDescription: The restaurant. Chandler and Monica are sitting at a table

lines.Line: I can't believe she's gonna say yes to David. She's clearly in love with Mike
You know, it's very hard to take you seriously when you look like that

lines.Character: (David and Phoebe sit down at a table close to Chandler and Monica'
lines.Line: David and Phoebe sit down at a table close to Chandler and Monica's
Uh, Phoebe, uh, I have... something I wanna say
Uh, Phoebe, uh, I have... something I wanna say
Oh my God, he's gonna do it now. Please, I cannot watch this, let's go
I think we have some time. Have you ever heard him talk? (doing David) "Uh, Phoebe, uh, I would be honoured, uh..." Spit it out, David
Uh, Phoebe, uh... (Chandler hits his own head) you're an amazing woman, and the time we spent apart was, was unbearable. Of course the sanitation strikes in Minsk didn't help
But well, now that we're together again, I don't ever want to be apart. So, to that end..

lines.Character: (David produces the ring. At the same time, Mike walks in, behind Davi
lines.Line: David produces the ring. At the same time, Mike walks in, behind David
Hi David. Chandler. Monica... (Looks at Monica, checking her big hair, aghast) Oh
What are you, what are you doing here
I have a question I need to ask you
I have a question I was kinda gonna ask her myself
Yeah, I understand, but before you do, she really needs to hear this
(annoyed) Ok, would you care for my seat as well
(annoyed) Ok, would you care for my seat as well
That's fair, you've had a long trip. (he leaves his seat to Mike, and stands there looking for a chair. He finally goes to Monica and Chandler's table

Phoebe, I love you. I mean, I missed you so much these last few months and I thought we were apart for a good reason, but then I suddenly realized that there was no reason good enough to keep me from spending the rest of my life with you
Kinda stepped on the toes of what I was going to say
Kinda stepped on the toes of what I was going to say
Sorry David, but she really has to know this
Alright, but after this I want to see you outside. If the rain stops
You're the most incredible woman I've ever met. How can I lose you? (Phoebe looks very flattered) Now, I don't actually have a ring..
I wouldn't brag too much about that thing, big guy
(smiles at him happily for a few seconds before answering) No
I love you. But I never needed a proposal from you. I just needed to know that we were headed somewhere, you know, that we had a future
We can have any future you want
We can have any future you want

lines.Character: (they hold their hands, gazing at each othe
lines.Line: they hold their hands, gazing at each other
David, I'm so sorry, I'm sorry
Just so I know, if I had asked first..
Yeah, I might have said yes, but that would have been wrong

Please, you don't have to explain. I mean, perhaps if I hadn't gone to Minsk things would have worked out for us. And I wouldn't have ruined my career, or lost that toe to frostbite. It was a good trip! (he leaves
Is it ok if I hug you now
Is it ok if I hug you now
Is it ok if I hug you now
(to everybody) BECAUSE OF OUR MEDDLING! Alright

8.SceneDescription: Conference room. Ross is making his keynote speech

lines.Line: Then we have to await the data from recent MRI scans and DNA testing which call into question information gathered from years of simple carbon dating
Look at that woman sitting by the pool getting tan... so leathery and wrinkled, I'm so jealous
Finally, factoring the profusion of new species recently discovered: Gigantosaurus, Argentinasaurus..
(to a paleontologist sitting next to him) Not to mention the cold sores
And that's just the herbivores. I'm not even gonna discuss the carnivores, their heads are already too big. Which is ironic considering their stunted cerebral development
(to the one sitting next to him) Really
But all kidding aside, in much the same way that Homo ergaster [1] is now thought to be a separate species from Homo erectus..
... and while there are certainly vast differences between these Mesozoic fossiles and the example of Homo erectus..

9.SceneDescription: the hotel lobby. Monica, Phoebe, Chandler and Mike walk in from the outside.

lines.Line: (her hair bigger then before) I can't believe it's raining again! Oh, it's so unfair!!

lines.Character: (They approach the buffet, where a couple of paleontologists are sipping their drink
lines.Line: They approach the buffet, where a couple of paleontologists are sipping their drinks
Well, on the bright side, now you won't have to see all these paleontologists with their shirts off. (Grabs a drink and notices that the two men are upset) Not you guys. You got it going on

lines.Character: (Monica, Phoebe, Chandler and Mike walk away, sipping their drink
lines.Line: Monica, Phoebe, Chandler and Mike walk away, sipping their drinks
So, what are we gonna do today
So, what are we gonna do today
They have a game room downstairs! Ping pong and stuff
(pleasantly surprised) Ping pong? (to Chandler) Honey, they have ping pong! Let's play
Because you know how competitive you get and well, I say it's cute, others disagree, and I'm lying
Oh, yeah? What happened when we played last time

lines.Character: (Chandler turns to Mike and gives him a
lines.Line: Chandler turns to Mike and gives him a "See what I mean?" look

10.SceneDescription: the hotel game room. There is a ping pong table in the middle of the room. Monica, Phoebe, Chandler and Mike walk in

lines.Line: All right, all right... I'll play if we don't keep score
But then how do we know who wins
But then how do we know who wins
So, we're just four losers... SUPER
Mike, you don't know, you don't know what you're doing
She gets crazy! This scar (points to his forehead) is from Pictionary
(disbelieving) I think I will be all right! (to Monica) You wanna volley a bit for a serve

lines.Character: (Monica and Mike start to play ping pong. Mike score
lines.Line: Monica and Mike start to play ping pong. Mike scores
Oh, by the way... I'm awesome!
(nearly whispering) Oh dear God, there's two of them
(to Phoebe) Did you know this about him
No idea! I though he was soft like you
To see who goes first, you got a quarter
(going through her pockets) No... (to Chandler and Phoebe) Either of you girls got a quarter
Honey, try to focus the trash talk on him
Honey, try to focus the trash talk on him
(picks up a coin from her bra) Monica, you call it
Oh, no! I don't think so! You know, according to standard table tennis rules if at any time a player uses his non racket bearing hand to touch the playing surface he or she forfeits the point

11.SceneDescription: Rachel's hotel room. Joey is standing at the door, facing Rachel

lines.Line: (nearly whispering) Ok, let's not make a big thing about this
Not working with me, Joe! Here's the thing: lately I have been having thoughts (pauses) musings, if you will

What the... DIAL IT DOWN! (Joey goes to sit on the bed) Listen, ok, and maybe they're crazy thoughts, but sometimes I do, I have, I've been thinking about... you know, us! (looks at Joey, who's totally distraught) Ok, dial it up a little
(stands up) I just have one question
(stands up) I just have one question
(desperate) What the hell are you doin'??

I don't know, I'm not trying to do anything, it's just, we have such a good time when we're together, you know... I mean, aren't you just a... little curious... (insinuating) what that would be like?..
Uh, am I curious? I mean, I am as curious as... as... George!
CURIOUS GEORGE (see link)! You know, the monkey, and the guy with the yellow hat
Oh yes, of course, I remember him
Yeah, he had a paper route
Yeah, he had a paper route
Yeah, he did! (smiling) Oh, see, this is what I'm talking about
No, I know, yeah I know we're great but Rach no... this... this can't happen
But can it... just... happen a little bit
But can it... just... happen a little bit
(charmed, but then recoiling) NO, NO! It can't happen at all

Because... look, no one wants this to happen more than me, ok? (in a trembling voice) I have gone over this moment in my head a hundred times and not once did I ever say no! (sighs) I couldn't do it to Ross
But that wasn't gonna stop you before
But that wasn't gonna stop you before
I know, I know! But I've thought about it a lot since, and it just wouldn't be right... (painfully) I'm sorry...
(regretful) I'm sorry, too! (they look at each other sadly, then she recollects, and puts her hands over her eyes) OH GOD! I shouldn't have said anything
NO! No-no-no-no-no-no! Hey! Hey, we'll be fine! Li... hey, like you said: no big deal
It's so not a big deal
Yeah! I'll see ya later! Yeah
Yeah! I'll see ya later! Yeah

lines.Character: (They shake hands, he walks out and shuts the door, then seems to change his mind, moves to open the door, than changes his mind again and leans over the door. Just then, Rachel opens the doo
lines.Line: They shake hands, he walks out and shuts the door, then seems to change his mind, moves to open the door, than changes his mind again and leans over the door. Just then, Rachel opens the door
Joey falls backwards into the room

12.SceneDescription: hotel's bar, Ross and Mr. Oberblau are talking

lines.Line: I'm just saying, I have a cabin in the Adirondacks if you ever want to get away from the city, well, that'd be (pause) just nifty
Ooh, well. Ah, I kinda have got a lot on my plate right now, not that I wouldn't love a weekend in the country with a strange man. (Mr. Oberblau giggles
(seeing her) Oh, you're back... (to Ross) this is my wife, Nancy
Ross, can I talk to you for a minute
Yes, please! (they move and sit down on a sofa) So, what's going on
Uh, well... Joey and I broke up
Uh, well... Joey and I broke up
Joey is a great guy, but we're just... so different! I mean, during your speech he kept laughing at homo erectus
Anyway I just, uh, I think it's for the best
I guess. There was hum... (she breathes deeply) there was another reason that I thought it was time to end it with Joey. I started to realize that I was having feelings for someone (pause) else
(merrily) Ok Geller. Last day of the conference, you know what happens to the keynote speaker
Oh, professor Clerk we're kind of in the middle of a conversation, here
Yeah, can you guys just throw him in the pool later
Or we could throw you both in now
Or we could throw you both in now

(standing) Ok, gentlemen! Please! Aren't we a little old for this? I mean, we're scientists, right? We're academics. And most importantly I... you-you will have to catch us first. (he starts to run away with Charlie). GO, GO, GO! (the paleontologists starts chasing them

13.SceneDescription: Hotel's bar. Ross is running to Charlie trying not to be seen with two cocktails in his hands. She's hidden behind a huge plant

lines.Line: Are they still looking for us
Yeah. The bartender said that they split up into two search parties, the herbivores and the carnivores. (pause) You know, we as a group are not the coolest

lines.Character: (Three paleontologists walk by and Ross hugs Charlie trying not to be see
lines.Line: Three paleontologists walk by and Ross hugs Charlie trying not to be seen
I don't think they saw us
I don't think they saw us
I don't think they saw us

lines.Character: (They realize that they are hugging closely and he draws bac
lines.Line: They realize that they are hugging closely and he draws back

Hum, so, I started to say you something earlier, hum... (pause) There was another reason I realized it was time to end it with Joey. I kind of realized I... was starting to have feelings... for someone else
(apparently unruffled) Oh. Can I... can I ask who
(apparently unruffled) Oh. Can I... can I ask who
I think I know too but I've been really wrong about this stuff in the past, so..

lines.Character: (Charlie kisses Ross, they stop for a moment and then he kisses her bac
lines.Line: Charlie kisses Ross, they stop for a moment and then he kisses her back
I mean, you just went out with my best friend, and I just think it'd be a really really bad idea. (pause) Or-or not! (they kiss passionately

lines.Character: (Joey walks in and sees Ross and Charlie kissing. He gives a faint, rueful smile, then he seems to recollect something and suddenly he moves back to Rachel's room. He knocks on her door and she open
lines.Line: Joey walks in and sees Ross and Charlie kissing. He gives a faint, rueful smile, then he seems to recollect something and suddenly he moves back to Rachel's room. He knocks on her door and she opens

lines.Character: (Joey says nothing, but enters the room and kisses her. They are kissing passionately only to stop for a brief
from Rachel. They continue their passionate kiss and Joey closes the door with his foot and it shuts in the camera's
. And that's the end of the ninth season
lines.Line: Joey says nothing, but enters the room and kisses her. They are kissing passionately only to stop for a brief "oh" from Rachel. They continue their passionate kiss and Joey closes the door with his foot and it shuts in the camera's "face". And that's the end of the ninth season.
